column5: Our campsite is located on the hill behind Terlingua Ghost Town, 1/2 mile from Restaurants, Coffee Shop and the world famous front porch. We have a composting toilet on the campground and an outdoor shower available. The view from your campsite is an unparalleled 360 degree panoramic view of the Big Bend region complete with a sunrise over the Chisos and a sunset in the Chihuahan desert of Mexico. The road to the campsite is unpaved and has some rough patches. Just take it slow.
